HERO.TITLE: Your shop of always just one click away
HERO.SUBTITLE: Buy in the store you love, with the usual prices in the comodidad of your home with T'Compro App.

FEATURES.TITLE: Features
FEATURES.SUBTITLE: With T'Compro app you can rediscover the experience of buying your favorite products in your usual winery.
FEATURES.ITEM_1_TEXT: Choose the products of your favorite brands to prepare your order. Choose details about how you want to make your order, such as the delivery and payment modality.
FEATURES.ITEM_2_TEXT: Get a vision of business near you that can attend your purchase. Compare offers, delivery time and choose the best option for you.
FEATURES.ITEM_3_TEXT: Wait for your delivery or collect in store when your order is ready to carry.

TESTIMONIALS.TITLE: Testimonials
TESTIMONIALS.SUBTITLE: Our customers love T'Compro!
TESTIMONIALS.CARD_1_TEXT: The T'Compro app has made my life so much easier. I can order from my favorite local store and have it delivered to my door. The best part is that the prices are the same as in the store!
TESTIMONIALS.CARD_2_TEXT: I love being able to support local businesses through this app. It's so easy to use and the delivery is always on time. I highly recommend it!
TESTIMONIALS.CARD_3_TEXT: I was a bit hesitant to use a new app, but T'Compro has exceeded my expectations. The customer service is excellent and the app is very user-friendly. I'm a very happy customer!

CONTACT.TITLE: Contact us
